snippet.title: The Hunt for Red October 1987 [Amiga] subsim - Tedious Retro Gamer
snippet.description: Classic game that was advertised as "ultimate submarine combat simulator", but even by 1987 standards it was barely a decent #subsim that offered limited options and long, long hours of pure boredom. More on http://www.war-movies.info/game/the-hunt-for-red-october
